title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo "Host:".
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, nothing happens and the focus does not change.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo "Host:" when clicked.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the screen with the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Verify that the focus caret appears in the first Combo "Host:".
